hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Bolero of Fire#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #1# major item.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Din's Fire#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of #gold#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the easiest way to kill Peahats is using Din's Fire while they're grounded.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #the Fire Arrows#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Hover Boots# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Fire Temple#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Din's Fire#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Requiem of Spirit#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Bolero of Fire#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the path of #gold#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Requiem of Spirit#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Magic Meter#.

ZF (Jabu).text: I hear Termina is a great spot for a vacation!
